comment: This guy is bold. but hilarious.  For the more sensitive people, they might not be able to handle his honesty.  He's a little on the tough side.  He has zero tolerance for excuses.  He's straightforward.  He told us not to come crying to him about bumping our grade up.  Doesn't give tips for the practical so it's an on your own type of lab.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS
